meanings.definition: The act of feeding on plants.
meanings.sent1: The herbivories of the deer help them stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Many animals show herbivories by munching on grass and leaves.
meanings.sent3: The herbivories of the rabbits make them the true vegetarians of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The herbivories of the cows paint the fields with their grazing patterns.
meanings.sent5: The herbivories of the giraffes are a beautiful sight as they reach for the leaves on tall trees.

meanings.definition: The behavior of animals that eat only plants.
meanings.sent1: The herbivories of the panda are well-known around the world.
meanings.sent2: Some animals exhibit herbivories as their primary feeding behavior.
meanings.sent3: The herbivories of the koalas make them the pickiest eaters in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The herbivories of the elephants shape the landscape of the savanna.
meanings.sent5: The herbivories of the horses keep the meadows trimmed and neat.
